EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Introducing Spring Cloud Task
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar Introducing Spring Cloud Task on Thursday, April 28, 2016.
Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, April 28, 2016
Time: 3:00PM Time (London, GMT)
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1175611/CB10786F2652640FB8056003789A08DB]]>
Audio Information:
This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers.
{{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
We look forward to you joining us!
